response.overview: On a turbulent night, a destitute man obtains a deserted wallet full of money, only to find the owner observing him closely. To his surprise, the brooding owner implores him to keep the purse as apparently, he won’t be needing it anymore. Upon further inquiry, it is revealed that the latter intends to commit suicide before the night ends. All alone in the still of the night, it is up to the poor, yet compassionate man to convince the grief-stricken stranger to change his mind before it is too late.
response.title: PORITYAG – ABANDONMENT
